duties_responsibilities.duty: Create visually appealing and consistent email designs that align with the company's design system and enhance the overall customer experience.
Work within the design system and collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure adherence to design guidelines and standards.
Leverage experience in designing for emails to create engaging and effective delivery notifications that inform and delight customers.
Operate in a fast-paced environment, iterating on designs rapidly to drive quick progress and support ambitious goals.
Provide detailed design specifications to engineers and tech partners to facilitate seamless implementation of designs.
Ensure designs prioritize accessibility best practices to guarantee an inclusive experience for all users.

education_certification.credential: No degree requirement; experience and portfolio speak volumes.
